line_1: Light round thy paths may Pleasure trip,
line_2: May sprightly Health, with rosy lip

line_1: See lively POPE advance in jig and trip,
The next in fame, that made a trip
line_2: Was Delia — and the only slip

line_1: Taught the light Foot a modish little Trip,
line_2: And pouted with the prettiest purple Lip —
Freight first embezzled, sink the ship.

line_1: The hungry read, and in they trip,
line_2: With eager eye and smacking lip:
